about_the_game:
• A detailed Guidebook/Walkthrough.

  • Posters and old Art.

  • Cheat Codes.

A small guide on how to access the Files for Parasite Black DLC!

If you've purchased the DLC for Parasite Black and are having trouble finding the files and cheats.txt file, follow these steps:

Open Steam:

1) Launch Steam and navigate to your Library.

2) Right-click on Parasite Black in your game list and select Manage > Browse Local Files. This will take you directly to the game’s root folder.

Locate the Premium Pack Folder:

3) Inside the game folder, find a subfolder called Premium Pack.

Open this folder, and you should see the cheats.txt file and all the other files.

Thank you!

content_descriptors.notes: There are artistic pictures with naked women engaging in various sexual and BDSM acts.
